org.apache.felix.ipojo.api

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.api.Service
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandlerConfiguration

    public class Service
extends Object
implements HandlerConfiguration
    Allows configuring a provided service.
    Author:
    Felix Project Team
